title: A Royal Welcome (3U4)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Dwarf ally to heal a Dwarf companion.
Lore:	”'There is even a chance that Dwarves are there, and that in some deep hall of his fathers, Balin son of Fundin may be found.'”
Rarity:	U
